serviceRadius: We serve San Diego and surrounding coastal communities within 25 miles

areas.name: San Diego
areas.description: Our home base! {{businessName}} serves all of {{city}} from Mission Hills to Mira Mesa, covering condos, single-family homes, and vacation rentals throughout the metro.
areas.localChallenges: {{city}}'s coastal air brings salt residue that settles on windows, fixtures, and outdoor furniture year-round. Sand tracked in from beaches and ocean breezes carrying fine dust require more frequent cleaning cycles than inland homes.
serviceHighlights: Salt air and coastal residue removal

areas.name: La Jolla
areas.description: {{businessName}} serves La Jolla's luxury oceanfront homes, cliffside estates, and upscale condos with white-glove cleaning tailored to high-end coastal properties.
areas.localChallenges: Oceanfront and cliff-side properties in La Jolla face relentless salt spray that corrodes surfaces and leaves chalky film on glass. Vacation rental demand is exceptionally high, requiring fast, reliable turnover cleaning between guests.
serviceHighlights: Salt spray and mineral deposit treatment

areas.name: Coronado
areas.description: Serving Coronado's historic homes, beachfront cottages, and short-term rentals with professional cleaning that keeps up with the island's high hospitality standards.
areas.localChallenges: As a near-island community, Coronado properties are surrounded by water on three sides, intensifying salt air exposure and humidity. The silver sand from Coronado Beach is notoriously fine and gets tracked throughout homes, requiring thorough cleaning after every beach day.

areas.name: Encinitas
areas.description: {{businessName}} brings reliable, eco-conscious cleaning to Encinitas homes, surf cottages, and vacation rentals along the North County coast.
areas.localChallenges: Encinitas's surf culture means homes regularly deal with sand, salt water, and wetsuit residue. The strong coastal winds push salt air and pollen inland, coating surfaces and windows with fine grime faster than most homeowners expect.
serviceHighlights: Surf home and beach cottage specialists
Flexible scheduling for vacation rental hosts

areas.name: Del Mar
areas.description: Serving Del Mar's exclusive beachfront estates, bluff-top homes, and short-term vacation properties with meticulous cleaning services.
areas.localChallenges: Del Mar's clifftop and beachfront estates are exposed to constant ocean wind and salt mist. The high concentration of short-term vacation rentals means properties turn over frequently and must meet exacting cleanliness standards between high-paying guests.
serviceHighlights: Window and exterior surface salt removal

areas.name: Carlsbad
areas.description: From Carlsbad Village to La Costa, {{businessName}} serves the full range of {{city}} area homes, from family residences to vacation properties near the beach.
areas.localChallenges: Carlsbad's combination of coastal and inland neighborhoods means varied cleaning challenges â€” salt air and sand near the coast, and fine dust and pollen further inland. The area's growing vacation rental market demands quick, thorough turnovers that meet guest expectations.
serviceHighlights: Vacation rental and Airbnb turnover cleaning
Recurring weekly and bi-weekly service plans
